body: I love the holidays, especially giving, what about you? What's your favourite part of the holidays?
body_tagged: I love the holidays, especially giving, what about you? What's your favourite part of the holidays?
title: Holidays are coming!

replies.body:
My favourite part of the holidays is when I get out from my apartment so I go to places like Uruguay or Mexico, or maybe USA :P
And if it's chrismas holidays, I love chrismas! :D

Snow and Christmas treeeeess. Idk why, I love Christmas trees. AND THE SPARKLY LIGHTS
